bike.description: Stumpjumper FSR FACT IS carbon 8M main triangle, M5 alloy SS/CS with Brain mount, full cartridge bearing pivots, 140mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.875x1.9" Integrated cartridge bearing shock mount.
Specialized Future Shock S140TA, 140-115mm travel adjust, Trail Tune, Brain Fade, rebound adj., carbon 1-1/8" to 1.5" steerer
1-1/8" Threadless, 1 1/2" lower, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing
3D forged alloy, adjustable rise, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized XC Carbon riser bar, 31.8mm, 660mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 6 degree up
Specialized waffle lock on grip (S/M) Specialized Thick lock on grip (L/XL)
Avid Elixir CR Mag for SBC, alloy backed semi met pads, Elixir mag lever w/carbon lever blade and reach adj, Elixir aluminum caliper, SS hardware package, S, M: 185mm rotor, L, XL: 203mm rotor.
Avid Elixir CR Mag for SBC, alloy backed semi met pads, Elixir mag lever w/carbon lever blade and reach adj, Elixir aluminum caliper, SS hardware package, S, M: 160mm rotor, L, XL: 185mm rotor.
Avid Elixir CR Mag with tool-less reach and pad contact adj
Shimano M770 XT, DMD, top swing, dual pull
SRAM X-0, 9-speed, mid cage
SRAM X-0, carbon/aluminum trigger
Shimano M770 XT, 9-speed, 11-34t
SRAM PC-971, 9-speed w/Power Link
Shimano FC-M770 XT, 2pc., S: 170mm, others: 175mm
44A x 32A x 22S, 4-bolt, 104/64mm
Custom Shimano BB-91, OS, press-in bearing
Roval Control AL, disc, 24mm
Roval Control AL, alloy, oversize 28mm axel caps
Roval Control AL with alloy freehub
S-Works Purgatory, 26x2.2", 120 TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead, dual compound
The Captain Control, 26x2.0", 60 TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead, dual compound
Ultralight presta valve
Specialized Format, Ti rails, SL foam, S/M/L: 130mm XL:143mm
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, S/M: 367mm L/XL:410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frame
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
